name: Nova Urbana
summary:
Invite your friends to join you in an amazing experience through Nova Urbana’s brazilian inspired suburbs. Discover a new way to play in this physics sandbox city.

In Nova Urbana you can choose between the greatest cars of all time, from the classic Beatle to yellow Camaro.
You can be whatever you want: the best pizza delivery person or a 5 star Driver! The biggest collector or a master of the wheel in the challenges of chrome rims!
